dcterms:creator: D. Harman
M. Liberman
dcterms:description: A collection of news articles from the San Jose Mercury News (SJMN) in 1991, used for topic modeling experiments. The corpus was processed into three versions: original, lemmatised, and lemmatised nouns only.
dcterms:title: San Jose Mercury News (SJMN) articles from the Tipster corpus
